SEARCH
Module com.ekidroske.kidroske_elise_lms
Package database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class represents the database layer of the library management system. This class directly interacts with the internal library database. It also exchanges information to and from the application layer and the database.
Author:
Elise Kidroske

      Returns:
